events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit me correctly. I would like to return it and get a full refund.
The issue has been identified as a request for refund due to an incorrect size, categorizing under the refund cluster.
Customer service agent Sarah has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer service. I’m here to help you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm that the item is unused and in its original packaging for the refund?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags, and has never been worn or washed.
Thank you for the details. You can send back the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly, and we will process your full refund promptly after receiving it.
That sounds great, thank you for the help and clear instructions. I look forward to receiving the return label.
The prepaid return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to inform you that your refund is being processed.
Your refund has been completed successfully and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance in the future.
